mapper.select:
select
from b_otaorder where Mid = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and HotelId = #{hotelid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and orderstatus >=160 and orderstatus <= 200

mapper.update:
update b_otaorder
HotelId = #{hotelid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Hotelname = #{hotelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Hotelpms = #{hotelpms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Ordermethod = #{ordermethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Ordertype = #{ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Pricetype = #{pricetype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Mid = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MLevel = #{mlevel,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Promotion = #{promotion,jdbcType=CHAR},
Coupon = #{coupon,jdbcType=CHAR},
TotalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BreakfastNum = #{breakfastnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ContactsPhone = #{contactsphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ContactsEmail = #{contactsemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ContactsWeixin = #{contactsweixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OrderStatus = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Receipt = #{receipt,jdbcType=CHAR},
Updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
canshow = #{canshow,jdbcType=CHAR},
hiddenOrder = #{hiddenorder,jdbcType=CHAR},
ostype = #{ostype,jdbcType=CHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spreadUser = #{spreaduser,jdbcType=BIGINT},
daynumber = #{daynumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isscore = #{isscore,jdbcType=CHAR},
activeid = #{activeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Invalidreason = #{invalidreason,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update b_otaorder set HotelId = #{hotelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Hotelname = #{hotelname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Hotelpms = #{hotelpms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ordermethod = #{ordermethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Ordertype = #{ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Pricetype = #{pricetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Begintime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Mid = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MLevel = #{mlevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Promotion = #{promotion,jdbcType=CHAR}, Coupon = #{coupon,jdbcType=CHAR}, TotalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BreakfastNum = #{breakfastnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ContactsPhone = #{contactsphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ContactsEmail = #{contactsemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ContactsWeixin = #{contactsweixin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderStatus = #{orderstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Paystatus = #{paystatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Receipt = #{receipt,jdbcType=CHAR}, Updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, canshow = #{canshow,jdbcType=CHAR}, hiddenOrder = #{hiddenorder,jdbcType=CHAR}, ostype = #{ostype,jdbcType=CHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spreadUser = #{spreaduser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, daynumber = #{daynumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isscore = #{isscore,jdbcType=CHAR}, activeid = #{activeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Invalidreason = #{invalidreason,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(ut.mid), 0) AS max, IFNULL(MIN(ut.mid), 0) AS min FROM b_otaroomorder bor LEFT JOIN b_otaorder bo ON bor.OtaOrderId = bo.id LEFT JOIN b_pmsroomorder bp ON bor.PMSRoomOrderNo = bp.PmsRoomOrderNo and bor.hotelid=bp.hotelid INNER JOIN u_ticket ut ON bo.id = ut.otaorderid where bo.ordertype=#{ordertype} and bo.orderStatus=#{orderstatus} and bp.checkouttime < #{checkouttime} and ut.activityid=#{activeid}

SELECT count(1) FROM b_otaroomorder bor LEFT JOIN b_otaorder bo ON bor.OtaOrderId = bo.id LEFT JOIN b_pmsroomorder bp ON bor.PMSRoomOrderNo = bp.PmsRoomOrderNo AND bor.hotelid = bp.hotelid WHERE bp. STATUS IN ('IN', 'OK', 'PM') and bo.mid=#{mid}

SELECT IFNULL(MAX(bo.mid), 0) AS max, IFNULL(MIN(bo.mid), 0) AS min FROM b_otaroomorder bor LEFT JOIN b_otaorder bo ON bor.OtaOrderId = bo.id LEFT JOIN b_pmsroomorder bp ON bor.PMSRoomOrderNo = bp.PmsRoomOrderNo AND bor.hotelid = bp.hotelid WHERE bp. STATUS IN ('IN', 'OK', 'PM') AND bp.checkintime between #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT bo.mid FROM b_otaroomorder bor LEFT JOIN b_otaorder bo ON bor.OtaOrderId = bo.id LEFT JOIN b_pmsroomorder bp ON bor.PMSRoomOrderNo = bp.PmsRoomOrderNo AND bor.hotelid = bp.hotelid WHERE bo.mid > #{begin} and bo.mid <= ${max} and bp. STATUS IN ('IN', 'OK', 'PM') AND bp.checkintime between #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY bo.mid HAVING COUNT(bo.id) = 1 ORDER BY bo.mid ASC limit #{limit}

select count(distinct id) as checknum from b_otaorder where orderstatus != 510 and orderstatus != 511 and orderstatus != 512 and orderstatus != 513 and mid = #{mid} and spreaduser is not null and invalidreason is null and rulecode=1002 and createtime between #{startdate} and #{enddate}

select count(distinct id) as checknum from b_otaorder where orderstatus != 510 and orderstatus != 511 and orderstatus != 512 and orderstatus != 513 and mid = #{mid} and hotelid = #{hotelid} and spreaduser is not null and invalidreason is null and rulecode=1002 and createtime between #{startdate} and #{enddate}

select count(distinct id) as checknum from b_otaorder where orderstatus != 510 and orderstatus != 511 and orderstatus != 512 and orderstatus != 513 and mid = #{mid} and spreaduser is not null and invalidreason is null and rulecode=1002 and createtime between #{startdate} and #{enddate}
